origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TransportAPI.get_operating_costs', 'description': 'This function provides the operating costs for specified transportation companies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyNames', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of company names for which operating costs are requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'operatingCosts', 'description': 'A dictionary mapping each company name to its operating costs.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 TransportAPI.get_operating_costs, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyNames'是['ABC Logistics', 'XYZ Shipping', 'PQR Transport'].
